H0.text: The novel, "Birdsong", by Sebastian Faulks, is mainly set during which war?". World War 2

H1.text: The novel, "Birdsong", by Sebastian Faulks, is mainly set during which war?". The Crimean War

H2.text: The novel, "Birdsong", by Sebastian Faulks, is mainly set during which war?". The Boer War

H3.text: The novel, "Birdsong", by Sebastian Faulks, is mainly set during which war?". WW1
